contextId.information: This sentence states the opposite of what it means for emphasis. AT: "I will keep everyone who comes to me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
contextId.quote: he who comes to me I will certainly not throw out

contextId.information: Here litotes is used to emphasize that Jesus will keep everyone that God gives to him. AT: "I should keep all of them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
contextId.quote: I would lose not one of all those
